full_output.summary: As a Fourth Year B.Tech. Computer Science student with good academic record, I possess the capability to solve problems efficiently using my knowledge. I am actively seeking opportunities to contribute to a challenging work environment, where I can demonstrate my skills and dedication to ongoing learning. My adaptable nature and commitment to personal growth position me as a valuable addition to any technology-focused team.

projects.name: E-Commerce website
projects.description: Developed an E-commerce website using MongoDB for flexible data storage, Express.js and Node.js for robust server-side logic, and React.js for dynamic user interfaces. With features like product browsing and secure checkout we provide a modern and responsive platform for online shopping.

projects.name: Service Provider
projects.description: Developed a robust MERN stack application that connects users with local service providers offering a range of services including plumbing, repair works, beauty services, and more. Implemented features allowing users to find nearby service providers or register their own services to reach potential customers. Utilized MongoDB for data storage, Express.js for server-side logic, ReactJS for dynamic front-end interfaces, and Node.js for backend integration, ensuring a seamless user experience.

experiences.description: During my two-month virtual internship at CodeSwap Solutions, I gained fundamental expertise in web development. I focused on mastering the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to craft dynamic and adaptable websites. Through hands-on practice, I solidified my comprehension of essential front-end technologies, honing my skills in website creation.

full_output.name: Venkata Sai Karthik Pampana
